hadith.chapterTitle: Kind Treatment towards Parents and establishment of the ties of Blood Relationship
hadith.body:
'Aishah (May Allah be pleased with her) reported: Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said, "The bond of relationship is suspending from the Throne, and says: 'He who keeps good relations with me, Allah will keep connection with him, but whosoever severs relations with me, Allah will sever connection with him".

[Al-Bukhari and Muslim].
- وعن عائشة قالت‏:‏ قال رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم‏:‏ ‏"‏الرحم معلقة بالعرش تقول‏:‏ من وصلني، وصله الله، ومن قطعني، قطعه الله‏"‏ ‏(‏‏(‏متفق عليه‏)‏‏)‏‏.‏
